Also, the Ammo pool could get into a bad state if you were knocked back/down while in the reload animation.

patchlogs.name: The Index Preview: Hotfix #2
patchlogs.changes: Excluded Reactant and Index Point pickups from Simulor, Inaros' Sandstorm, Zephyr Tornado, and Vauban's Vortex. This also fixes the exception lists for the Simulor; it wasn't supposed to be moving  gameplay objects (eg Datamass, Excavation Power Cells, Raptor Cells, etc) but it generally wasn't of a problem because the objects were heavy enough (properly excluding them should run faster too!). As more and more gameplay components rely on pickups, we've addressed this issue as it is commonly discussed by you all.

patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Strun Wraith being unable to equip the Strun Conclave Skin.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 17.0.3
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed some elements of Parkour 2.0 interfering with reload on the Strun and Strun Wraith.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 17.0.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Strun not being able to be reloaded until all shells are fired when using reload speed Mods.

patchlogs.name: Update 17: Echoes Of The Sentient
patchlogs.changes: Strun, Machete, Cleaver has been given the PBR treatment.

patchlogs.name: Update 16.7
patchlogs.changes: The Strun has received a PBR update!

patchlogs.name: Update 16.6.3
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Strun Wraith and Gorgon weapons not showing the correct Impact / Slash / Puncture stats in the Conclave Arsenal.

patchlogs.name: Update 15.9
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Strun and Strun Wraith making continuous clicking sounds when you hit an empty magazine.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 14.8.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an issue where having a status chance greater than 100% on the Boar Prime and Strun Wraith would cause the UI to display “0”

patchlogs.name: Update 9.5: Operation Arid Fear
patchlogs.changes: Added custom reload sounds for Strun, Dera, Supra, Gorgon, Ignis, Grakata, Acrid, Kraken, Hek, and Lex.

name: Supra
description: The SUPRA is a heavy laser gun with a short wind up time.

patchlogs.name: Beasts of the Sanctuary: Hotfix 22.18.1
patchlogs.changes: Supra Vandal is now tradable.

patchlogs.name: Update 21: Chains of Harrow
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed issues with Supra Vandal’s tinting.

patchlogs.name: The War Within: 19.1.0 Ash Revisited
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed reload sounds on the Supra.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 17.5.3
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Supra being unable to use the Rifle Ammo Mutation Mod.

patchlogs.name: Update 17.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Supra’s lensflare effect showing through walls.

patchlogs.name: Update 17: Echoes Of The Sentient
patchlogs.changes: The Supra has received several changes:

patchlogs.name: Update 15.8.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed audio issue when interrupting the Supra mid-reload.

patchlogs.name: Update 15.1.0+15.1.01
patchlogs.changes: Entropy Burst (Supra Mod) changed to max +20 Additive to base Status Chance.

patchlogs.name: Update 9.5: Operation Arid Fear
patchlogs.changes: Added custom reload sounds for Strun, Dera, Supra, Gorgon, Ignis, Grakata, Acrid, Kraken, Hek, and Lex.

patchlogs.name: Update 9: Vor's Revenge
patchlogs.changes: Fixed Supra - shots from the Supra will now correctly line up with the target reticule.

name: Sybaris
description: This Tenno crafted, lever action rifle, is equal parts elegance and executioner.

patchlogs.name: Oberon Prime: Hotfix 20.6.3
patchlogs.changes: The Sybaris Prime has had it's hip-fire / aim-fire recoil reviewed to have less side-to-side movement.

name: Synapse
description: Powered by a bio-chemical reaction, the infested Synapse rifle fries its targets with a steady stream of <DT_CORROSIVE>Corrosive energy.

patchlogs.name: Shrine of the Eidolon: Update 22.14.0
patchlogs.fixes: Synapse magazine capacity reduced from 30 to 25 in Conclave.

patchlogs.name: The Index Preview: Hotfix #4
patchlogs.changes: Properly enabled Synapse for Conclave.

name: Tenora
description: Unload percussive machine gun fire, or strike a heavy chord with a single charge shot. This is Octavia’s signature rifle.

patchlogs.name: Chains of Harrow: Update 21.4.0
patchlogs.fixes: Reduced the damage of the Tenora in Conclave.

patchlogs.name: Chains of Harrow: Hotfix 21.3.1
patchlogs.fixes: Increased Tenora’s magazine size from 50 to 70.

patchlogs.name: Octavia’s Anthem: Update 20.3.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Host/Client Damage value discrepancies when using the Tenora's Alt Fire on Grineer Earth tileset enemies.

name: Tetra
description: Drawing from its huge quad-chambered clip, the Tetra is capable of unleashing a sustained barrage of lethal energy bolts.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 17.4.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Prisma Tetra being absent from the Codex.

patchlogs.name: Update 13.1.0: Amprex
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Tetra having an incorrect Conclave rating.

name: Tiberon
description: Forged by a master gunsmith, this Tenno burst rifle will strike down targets with swift precision.

name: Tigris
description: The double-barreled Tigris shotgun fires two bursts in rapid succession, easily taking down the toughest prey.

patchlogs.name: Shrine of the Eidolon: Hotfix 22.12.3
patchlogs.changes: Tigris / Tigris Prime / Sancti Tigris

patchlogs.name: Octavia’s Anthem: Update 20.6.0 + 20.6.0.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Sancti Tigris Health buff not working for Clients and only lasting 10 seconds in total for the Host.

patchlogs.name: The Silver Grove: Update 1
patchlogs.changes: Removed a delay intended to fix frame rate when auto reloading a weapon. This primarily affected the Vectis and Tigris due to frequent reloading.

patchlogs.name: Update 16.9.0
patchlogs.changes: Improved the visual tint on the Tigris.

name: Tonkor
description: Hurl mayhem and destruction with this Grineer grenade launcher.

patchlogs.name: Update 21: Chains of Harrow
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed seeing squad mates’ Tonkor aim trail when shooting or aiming.

patchlogs.name: The Glast Gambit: Hotfix 19.11.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Tonkor's iron sights not being flipped up when first loading into a mission.

patchlogs.name: The Glast Gambit: Update 19.10.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed unintentional DOT from Adhesive Blast on the Ogris, Penta, Secura Penta, and Tonkor.

patchlogs.name: Update 17: Echoes Of The Sentient
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an issue causing players to be stuck in iron sights with the Tonkor when firing immediately after a quick melee.

patchlogs.name: Update 16.8.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Tonkor’s iron sights not closing when quick meleeing.

patchlogs.name: Update 16.7
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Tonkor’s projectile preview arc appearing underneath other effects.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 16.4.5 + 16.4.5.1 + 16.4.5.2
patchlogs.changes: The Tonkor can no longer bounce other players.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 16.4.3 + Credit Reimbursement #2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Mirage’s Clones being able to hit Mirage with Tonkor shots.

name: Torid
description: Torid lobs a toxic payload.

patchlogs.name: The Pacifism Defect: Hotfix 19.12.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed lingering Torid projectiles causing self-damage after Hall of Mirrors wears off.

patchlogs.name: Update 15.13
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Torid not dealing DOT damage to impacted target as per: https://forums.warframe.com/index.php?/topic/379733-bug-torid-enemies-hit-directly-not-damaged-by-clouds-3-months-old/

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 15.5.9
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed crash that would occur when Mirage used Hall of Mirrors with a Torid equipped as a client.

patchlogs.name: Update 14.10.0
patchlogs.changes: Changed Critical Chance logic by allowing it to occur on Radial Explosions (both friendly and enemy where applicable). This fixes an issue with the Torid’s gas cloud not allowing for Criticals.

patchlogs.name: Update 14.9.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixes reported cases of clients not being able to damage enemies caught in Vortex when using the Ogris, Torid, etc.
